channel.title: java 17 on JavaIsland
channel.description: Recent content in java 17 on JavaIsland

item.title: The Father of Java: Don't Stick with Java 8
item.description: James Gosling, the father of Java, recently twitter that developers should abandon JDK 8 as soon as possible and opt for JDK 17 LTS, which brings huge improvements in every aspect. But maybe the father of Java was just promoting Corretto, the OpenJDK distribution for his boss AWS. and he suggests that developers still using JDK 8 might consider using Corretto’s new version- -Includes all the latest updates and CVE defenses.
